text: Oh, Johnny is sneaking cookies out of the cookie jar for his sister's suit. Mother is washing the dishes and the sink is overflowing with the water on the floor. The curtains are spread aside to let the light in. There's plates and saucers on the table here. Shall I tell you some more? Just tell me everything you see going on in the picture and tell me anything you think is true. . No, I'm through.
